statements: SELECT * FROM song_lyrics;
SELECT song_title, artist_name FROM song_lyrics ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT lyrics FROM song_lyrics WHERE artist_name = 'Adele';
SELECT * FROM song_lyrics WHERE composer IS NOT NULL;
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(*) AS song_count FROM song_lyrics GROUP BY artist_name ORDER BY song_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM song_lyrics WHERE artist_name = 'Artist1';
SELECT song_title, composer FROM song_lyrics WHERE song_title LIKE '%Love%';
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(*) AS song_count FROM song_lyrics GROUP BY artist_name HAVING COUNT(*) >= 3;
SELECT DISTINCT artist_name FROM song_lyrics ORDER BY artist_name DESC;
SELECT song_title, LENGTH(lyrics) AS lyrics_length FROM song_lyrics WHERE LENGTH(lyrics) > 1000;
SELECT * FROM song_lyrics;
SELECT song_title, artist_name FROM song_lyrics;
SELECT song_title, artist_name, lyrics FROM song_lyrics WHERE artist_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM composition_credits ORDER BY credit_id DESC;
SELECT composer_name, composer_role FROM composition_credits WHERE song_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM song_lyrics WHERE artist_name = 'Adele';
SELECT song_title, artist_name FROM song_lyrics WHERE lyrics LIKE '%love%';
SELECT composer_name, composer_role FROM composition_credits WHERE song_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM song_lyrics JOIN composition_credits ON song_lyrics.song_id = composition_credits.song_id WHERE artist_name = 'Ed Sheeran';
SELECT song_title, artist_name, composer_name, composer_role FROM song_lyrics JOIN composition_credits ON song_lyrics.song_id = composition_credits.song_id WHERE composer_name = 'John Lennon';
SELECT * FROM lyrics;
SELECT title, artist FROM lyrics WHERE year > 2000;
SELECT artist, count(*) as total_songs FROM lyrics GROUP BY artist;
SELECT * FROM lyrics ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT title, lyrics_text FROM lyrics WHERE artist = 'Adele';
SELECT * FROM lyrics ORDER BY artist ASC, song_title DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT artist, COUNT(*) AS num_songs FROM lyrics GROUP BY artist ORDER BY num_songs DESC;
SELECT song_title, lyrics FROM lyrics WHERE artist='Taylor Swift' OR artist='Ed Sheeran' ORDER BY song_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM lyrics WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY release_date DESC, artist ASC;
SELECT artist, SUM(word_count) AS total_words FROM lyrics GROUP BY artist HAVING total_words > 50000 ORDER BY total_words DESC;
SELECT * FROM Songs;
SELECT song_title, artist_name, release_year FROM Songs ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM SongWriters WHERE nationality = 'American';
SELECT performer_name, gender FROM Performers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT song_title, artist_name, album_title, release_year FROM Songs WHERE release_year < 2000;
SELECT * FROM Songs;
SELECT song_title, artist_name, album_title FROM Songs WHERE release_year > 2000;

SELECT songwriter.writer_name, songwriter.nationality, song.song_title FROM SongWriters AS songwriter INNER JOIN Credits AS credit ON songwriter.writer_id = credit.writer_id INNER JOIN Songs AS song ON credit.song_id = song.song_id;

SELECT performer.performer_name, performer.gender, song.song_title FROM Performers AS performer INNER JOIN Credits AS credit ON performer.performer_id = credit.performer_id INNER JOIN Songs AS song ON credit.song_id = song.song_id WHERE performer.gender = 'Female';

SELECT song.song_title, credit.role, songwriter.writer_name FROM SongWriters AS songwriter INNER JOIN Credits AS credit ON songwriter.writer_id = credit.writer_id INNER JOIN Songs AS song ON credit.song_id = song.song_id WHERE songwriter.nationality = 'American';
SELECT * FROM Songs;
SELECT title, release_date FROM Songs WHERE composer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT title, composer_name FROM Songs s JOIN Composers c ON s.composer_id = c.composer_id;
SELECT song_id, title, role FROM Songs s JOIN Credits cr ON s.song_id = cr.song_id WHERE cr.role = 'Arranger';
SELECT album_name, COUNT(song_id) AS total_songs FROM Albums a JOIN AlbumSongs als ON a.album_id = als.album_id GROUP BY album_name;
SELECT * FROM Songs;
SELECT title, lyrics FROM Songs WHERE release_date >= '2000-01-01';
SELECT s.title, c.composer_name FROM Songs s JOIN Composers c ON s.composer_id = c.composer_id;
SELECT a.album_name, s.title, s.release_date FROM Albums a JOIN AlbumSongs AS als ON a.album_id = als.album_id JOIN Songs s ON s.song_id = als.song_id;

SELECT s.title, c.composer_name, als.track_number FROM Songs s JOIN Composers c ON s.composer_id = c.composer_id JOIN AlbumSongs AS als ON s.song_id = als.song_id ORDER BY s.title ASC, als.track_number DESC;
